large.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: big in size, amount, or number
large.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the US.
The T-shirt comes in Small, Medium and Large.
those who drink large amounts of coffee
A large number of students have signed up for the course.
large.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a large person is tall and often fat
